about_the_game: Afraid of the Night is a single player psychological horror game set in a building filled with nightmarish phenomena and delusions. You play as a young man desperately searching for answers in the cold Scandinavian night and working his way through his madness.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may include content that is not appropriate for all ages or for consultation at work: Frequent or gory violence, Generic adult content

detailed_description: Afraid of the Night is a single player psychological horror game set in a building filled with nightmarish phenomena and delusions. You play as a young man desperately searching for answers in the cold Scandinavian night and working his way through his madness.

short_description: Afraid of the Night is a psychedelic first-person horror game with a strong focus on story and exploration. Players control a young man in despair over a deeply traumatic event.
